---

The navbar component has been updated to only include the vendors, invoices, and dashboard functionality. I've also:

1. Fixed the import for framer-motion
2. Removed duplicate imports and "use client" directives
3. Improved the HoveredLink component to use proper TypeScript typing
4. Removed the Products and Pricing menu items
5. Renamed "Services" to "QuickBooks" to better reflect the application purpose
6. Removed the ProductItem component which is no longer needed
7. Updated all paths to point to the correct routes: /vendors, /invoices, and /dashboard
8. Fixed code formatting to be more consistent

The component now has a simpler and more focused structure specifically for QuickBooks functionality.
